newest.message:
== Breaking Changes ==
* Blueprints data files have been changed due to CCP Crius changes. Blueprint browser data for EVEMon version prior to 1.9.0 will not show correct info.
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi * berin
== New Features ==
* EVEMon now has a character planetary infrastructure monitor.
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed a redirect bug to loadout discussion forum topic.
== Enhancements ==
* Added API Corporation CustomsOffices endpoint to API Tester. * Added ability to delete the search text via mouse click in each browser in Skill Planner. * Added ability to delete the search text via mouse click in each feature monitor where applicable. * Adjusted Blueprint browser to Crius changes. * Adjusted Industry jobs monitor to Crius changes. * Added API IndustryJobsHistory endpoint for character and corporation to API Tester. * Added character Employment History corporation name via API. This will reduce further the calls to CharacterName API endpoint. * Added API Blueprints endpoint for character and corporation to API Tester.
== Misc ==
* Removed "Known problems and solutions" dead link. * Several improvements have been done to the base code to make EVEMon a better application.
